title: [Solhaven, Beacon Ring]
description: Curving to the southeast and northeast as they climb, two broad roadways circle the base of an ancient shell of a tower that stands just east of here.  A small court lies to the north of this intersection, but to the south the road bends to the southeast, forming a second circle around The Beacon.  Lit by a hand lantern, a pair of youths play a game of knucklebones against the retaining wall where the roadways diverge.

Curving to the southeast and northeast as they climb, two broad roadways circle the base of an ancient shell of a tower that stands just east of here.  A small court lies to the north of this intersection, but to the south the road bends to the southeast, forming a second circle around The Beacon.  Part way up the southeast roadway, a small boy plays with an old barrel hoop, repeatedly rolling it down the slope and chasing after it.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, southeast, south, west
Obvious paths: north, northeast, southeast, west
